title: Who needs to go to the office?
html: I love development & troubleshooting via conference call between 3 states. :) Well, not really. I'd've rather been on an iChat-style video conference or an IRC channel.
body: I love development & troubleshooting via conference call between 3 states.   :)  Well, not really.  I'd've rather been on an iChat-style video conference or an IRC channel.
